thread.title: Steven Gerrard: This is where Liverpool will finish at the end of the season
thread.title_full: Steven Gerrard: This is where Liverpool will finish at the end of the season

title: Steven Gerrard: This is where Liverpool will finish at the end of the season
text:
Steven Gerrard is backing Liverpool to secure a top-four spot 
Jurgen Klopp’s side were stunned at Anfield today after Swansea’s 3-2 victory. 
The defeat leaves the Reds in third place, seven points behind leaders Chelsea - who have a game in hand. The predicted final Premier League table according to stats geeks Saturday, 21st January 2017 HOW will the final Premier League table look? 1 / 20 20. Sunderland - 27 points (-35) “We’re going to have to have a bet. I’ll go top four” Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard 
Arsenal could also leapfrog Liverpool if the Gunners beat Burnley tomorrow afternoon. 
And Reds legend Gerrard has opened up on Liverpool’s season, claiming he’s confident they’ll secure a top four finish. 
GETTY Is Steven Gerrard right about Liverpool? 
After Harry Redknapp told BT Sport Klopp’s men will finish sixth, Gerrard said: “I don’t agree. 
“We’re going to have to have a bet. I’ll go top four.” Related articles
